de.hsb.ms.syn.common.ui

Class TouchMatrixPad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
        • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.ui.TouchMatrixPad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class TouchMatrixPad
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
    Custom UI widget for the 2D Touch Matrix screen. It provides functionality similar to the famous Korg KaossPad controllers. Users may assign Node parameters to the two axes of the touch matrix and manipulate these values using touch input.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TouchMatrixPad.TouchMatrixEvent
      Event class for TouchMatrixEvents.
      static class  TouchMatrixPad.TouchMatrixListener
      Listener class for TouchMatrixEvents.
